sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email">
    <sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <blind_copied/>
        <body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Hi &nbsp;Vishnu PV,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp;A Choice has been requested to create and requires your review and approval. Below are the details.<br><br> Action : create<br>Table : u_appraisal<br>Field : u_module<br>New Value : GRC&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Please review and approve the changes at your earliest convenience.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><font face="helvetica"></font></span></p><table><tbody><tr><td style="background-color: #d4fad9;border: 1px solid #d4fad9;-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-moz-border-radius: 5px;display: inline-block;padding: 10px;"><a href="mailto:dev240427@servicenowdevelopers.com?subject=Re%3A%20-%20approve&amp;body=%0A%0ARef:MSG0003759_T7TnuYIwxXqkHDIzG7eT" style="color: #000000;font-size: 19px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;">Approve</a></td></tr></tbody></table> <p></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><font face="helvetica"></font></span></p><table><tbody><tr><td style="background-color: #fad4d4;border: 1px solid #fad4d4;-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-moz-border-radius: 5px;display: inline-block;padding: 10px;"><a href="mailto:dev240427@servicenowdevelopers.com?subject=Re%3A%20-%20reject&amp;body=%0A%0ARef:MSG0003759_T7TnuYIwxXqkHDIzG7eT" style="color: #000000;font-size: 19px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;">Reject</a></td></tr></tbody></table><p></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><a href="/sysapproval_approver.do?sys_id=3bd6afd7c3ace21052237405e4013115&amp;sysparm_record_target=sysapproval_approver">click here to view approval record.</a></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Regards,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Zynder Tech.</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<br><br>

<a id="snc_notification_unsubscribe" href="mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?subject=Unsubscribe from &quot;Choice Configuration Approval&quot;&amp;body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification &quot;Choice Configuration Approval&quot;%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;8049e2dbc3cc621052237405e4013135&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;c797e62132&quot;}">Unsubscribe</a> | <a id="snc_notification_preference" href="https://dev240427.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=8049e2dbc3cc621052237405e4013135">Notification Preferences</a><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0003759_T7TnuYIwxXqkHDIzG7eT</div></body></html></body>
        <body_text/>
        <checkpoint>0</checkpoint>
        <content_type>text/html</content_type>
        <copied/>
        <deleted>false</deleted>
        <direct>vishnupv1024@gmail.com</direct>
        <error_string/>
